input.sentences: it was a very traditional wedding . the inside of this church was beautiful with the stained glass windows .
here come the bride and groom after being presented as husband and wife .
there were a lot of guests so four tiers of cake were needed . the top layer will be frozen and saved for their first anniversary .
another tradition is to feed each other the first bite of cake . it looks like they are being nice and not making a mess .
here they are with the customary first dance . she will dance with her father soon .
output.sentences: This bride and groom picked the perfect church for their traditional wedding.
The new wife and groom look happy as they exit the church.
This beautiful cake with three tiers awaits the happy couple at their reception.
Nothing like a bit of tradition and mess while feeding each other cake.
After the cake, don't forget the customaryfirst dance.
